'''0.1.3''' is a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released for client version [[Alpha v1.0.16_02|v1.0.16_02]] on August 17, 2010.<ref name="blogpost">[[wordofnotch:966780852|"Minecraft Server 0.1.3 (not the inventory yet!)"]] – [[The Word of Notch]], August 17, 2010</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added support for the {{cmd|tell}} command, used to whisper something to another player.
* Added support for the {{cmd|list}} command, which will show a list of connected players to the op who issued it.
* The server now logs what admin does what, and broadcasts any admin events to all connected ops.

== Changes ==
* Ops can now build in the spawn area.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed {{cmd|save-off}}.
